duties_responsibilities.duty: Proposing and conducting experiments with generative AI to enhance engineering processes, including problem decomposition, solution design, code generation, and advanced troubleshooting.
Documenting best practices and techniques in playbooks and guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.
Using AI tools and techniques to develop and ship actual features and products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
